sentences.en: " Didn't you hear him say he'd been with Yankee officers tonight? "
sentences.cn: " 你没听见他说吗.他刚才是和北方军官在一起 呢 .

sentences.en: But all dem Yankee folks, fust time dey meet me, dey call me'Mist'O'Hara.'
sentences.cn: 可是所有北方人, 头一次见到我, 都叫我'奥哈拉先生'.

sentences.en: His brisk manner branded him a Yankee.
sentences.cn: 他举止麻利,一看就是个北方佬.

sentences.en: I was playing poker tonight with two drunken Yankee captains and they let it out.
sentences.cn: 今天晚上我和两个喝醉酒的北方船长打扑克,是他们泄露出来的.

sentences.en: Kay said tartly, " And you're more Yankee than Italian.
sentences.cn: 恺酸溜溜他说: “ 可你哪,与其说是意大利人,还不如说是新英格兰人.

sentences.en: Lower courts have found, however, that Vermont Yankee does leave them some room for maneuver.
sentences.cn: 然而, 下级法院已经发现, 弗蒙特-扬基一案确实留有一些策略方面的余地.

sentences.en: Rhett was in there. But what should she say to the Yankee soldiers?
sentences.cn: 瑞德就在那里面, 可是她该对那些北方佬怎么说 呢 ?

sentences.en: She remembered her hot joy in shooting the marauding Yankee.
sentences.cn: 他们身上都有暴力的血,它危险地接近表面,就潜伏在那温文尔雅的外貌下.

sentences.en: Some Yankee chaplain would have written if this were true.
sentences.cn: 如果他真的死了,北方佬监狱里的牧师会写信的.

sentences.en: The Calverts are good folk, all of them, for all the old man marrying a Yankee.
sentences.cn: 卡尔费特家的人是好样的, 他们都是这样, 尽管那老头娶了北方佬.

sentences.en: The negroes were on top and behind them were the Yankee bayonets.
sentences.cn: 黑人爬到了上层,他们背后有北方佬的刺刀保护着.

sentences.en: This test was endorsed by the Supreme Court in the Vermont Yankee case.
sentences.cn: 这种检验在“弗蒙特-扬基”一案中得到最高法院的认可.

sentences.en: Vermont Yankee has been subject to some sharp criticism.
sentences.cn: 弗蒙特-扬基一案已经遭受到一些尖锐批评.

sentences.en: We sang these lines to the tune of Yankee Doodle.
sentences.cn: 我们用扬基歌的曲调唱这几句歌词.

sentences.en: Yankee soldiers loitered everywhere and Scarlett looked at them uncertainly , some of her courage deserting her.
sentences.cn: 北方士兵在到处溜达.思嘉心怀疑惧地看着他们,原先的勇气有点动摇了.

trans.tran_cn: 美国北方人的，美国佬式的
美国佬，美国人，北部人，北方佬，（南北战争时的）北军
trans.tran_en: an American – often used to show disapproval
